Vice President J D Vance notes the US-China relationship is complex.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/china-issue-more-complicated-after-tariff-on-india-will-donald-trump-impose-additional-duties-on-china-for-russia-oil-trade-what-jd-vance-said/articleshow/123232282.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/china-issue-more-complicated-after-tariff-on-india-will-donald-trump-impose-additional-duties-on-china-for-russia-oil-trade-what-jd-vance-said/articleshow/123232282.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 14:07:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="66282" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123232842,imgsize-66282.cms"/></item><item><title>Microsoft CEO to employees: No longer enough to be software factory, must become…</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft is undergoing a significant shift, transitioning from a software manufacturer to an "intelligence engine," according to CEO Satya Nadella. This transformation aims to democratize AI, empowering global users to create their own intelligent tools. Microsoft will focus on building AI systems that enable individuals and organizations to develop customized solutions, redesigning its technology stack to support this new vision.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-ceo-satya-nadella-to-employees-its-no-longer-enough-to-be-software-factory-must-become/articleshow/123230971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-ceo-satya-nadella-to-employees-its-no-longer-enough-to-be-software-factory-must-become/articleshow/123230971.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:34:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1442730" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123230948,imgsize-1442730.cms"/></item><item><title>New Income Tax Bill introduced in Parl: What are the top suggestions being included?</title><description><![CDATA[Nirmala Sitharaman presented the revised New Income Tax Bill 2025 in Parliament. This followed the withdrawal of the original bill. The new version incorporates recommendations from a Parliamentary Select Committee.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/new-income-tax-bill-2025-introduced-in-parliament-what-are-the-top-parliamentary-panel-suggestions-being-included-check-details/articleshow/123232971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/new-income-tax-bill-2025-introduced-in-parliament-what-are-the-top-parliamentary-panel-suggestions-being-included-check-details/articleshow/123232971.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 14:28:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19382" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123233253,imgsize-19382.cms"/></item><item><title>Amid speculation over India future, here’s when Kohli last played a List A match</title><description><![CDATA[Speculation surrounds Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma's ODI futures as the BCCI contemplates their roles. A proposal suggests they gain match practice in India A games against Australia A before the series, raising questions about their readiness and future in the format.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/12-years-ago-amid-speculation-over-india-future-heres-when-virat-kohli-last-played-a-list-a-match/articleshow/123232508.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/12-years-ago-amid-speculation-over-india-future-heres-when-virat-kohli-last-played-a-list-a-match/articleshow/123232508.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 13:50:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34614" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123232522,imgsize-34614.cms"/></item><item><title>Bihar: After ‘Dog Babu’, ‘Cat Kumar’ surfaces; mother's name listed as ‘Catiya Devi’</title><description><![CDATA[Authorities in Bihar's Rohtas district are investigating a bizarre incident where an application for a residential certificate was filed under the name "Cat Kumar," son of "Catty Boss" and "Catiya Devi," complete with a canine's photograph. A formal case has been registered. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-after-dog-babu-cat-kumar-surfaces-mothers-name-listed-as-catiya-devi/articleshow/123229810.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-after-dog-babu-cat-kumar-surfaces-mothers-name-listed-as-catiya-devi/articleshow/123229810.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 13:15:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1233871" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123230004,imgsize-1233871.cms"/></item><item><title>Melinda on Bill Gates driving daughter to school: Moms said class ‘changed’</title><description><![CDATA[Before their divorce, Bill and Melinda Gates navigated parenting challenges. Bill's insistence on driving their daughter Jennifer to a distant kindergarten, despite his demanding role as Microsoft CEO, surprised Melinda. This decision not only created cherished moments for Bill and his daughter but also inspired other fathers in their community to become more involved in school drop-offs, reshaping family dynamics.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/melinda-gates-on-moms-telling-her-how-her-daughters-classroom-changed-when-bill-gates-drove-her-to-kindergarten-daily-we-went-home-and-/articleshow/123228608.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/melinda-gates-on-moms-telling-her-how-her-daughters-classroom-changed-when-bill-gates-drove-her-to-kindergarten-daily-we-went-home-and-/articleshow/123228608.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 10:29:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32674" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123228600,imgsize-32674.cms"/></item><item><title>ODI WC trophy unveiled: Harmanpreet Kaur eyes ICC glory for India</title><description><![CDATA[Indian captain Harmanpreet Kaur expressed her team's determination to win the upcoming ODI Women’s World Cup on home soil, aiming to end India's long wait for an ICC women’s title. Despite Australia's strong start, their tour of India and an aging bowling attack could hinder their progress. South Africa's challenging away series in the subcontinent also diminish their chances of qualifying, according to Chopra.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wtc-final-they-will-leave-india-after-losing-former-cricketer-doubts-australia-south-africas-chances/articleshow/123231274.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wtc-final-they-will-leave-india-after-losing-former-cricketer-doubts-australia-south-africas-chances/articleshow/123231274.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:57:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63580" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123231384,imgsize-63580.cms"/></item><item><title>Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang answers Akshay Kumar’s big AI question</title><description><![CDATA[At the Nvidia AI Summit 2024 in Mumbai, Akshay Kumar questioned Jensen Huang about AI's limitations, sparking a viral discussion on its role. He emphasized the importance of safety, ethical design, and collaboration to ensure responsible AI development and maintain public trust.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-has-a-shocking-answer-to-akshay-kumars-biggest-ai-question-whats-the-one-thing-ai-cant-copy-from-humans/articleshow/123232086.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-has-a-shocking-answer-to-akshay-kumars-biggest-ai-question-whats-the-one-thing-ai-cant-copy-from-humans/articleshow/123232086.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 13:36:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50896" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123232271,imgsize-50896.cms"/></item><item><title>‘They are financially strong ...’: Gadkari’s veiled ‘dadagiri’ jibe amid Trump tariffs</title><description><![CDATA[Nitin Gadkari indirectly criticised US President Donald Trump's tariff policies, asserting that financial strength and technological advancement shouldn't lead to bullying. BJP's Amit Malviya called the matter serious, highlighting the contradiction and demanding accountability.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/heart-stopping-moment-congress-mp-claims-another-aircraft-was-on-same-runway-air-india-contradicts-him/articleshow/123228665.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/heart-stopping-moment-congress-mp-claims-another-aircraft-was-on-same-runway-air-india-contradicts-him/articleshow/123228665.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 10:36:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="658227" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123228711,imgsize-658227.cms"/></item><item><title>Harry Gill: 2 vodka cans in one hand, a one-handed screamer in the other - Watch</title><description><![CDATA[Harry Gill, a 26-year-old pilot, became an overnight sensation in Darwin after making a stunning one-handed catch at the Australia vs. South Africa T20 match. Gill's impressive grab added to the excitement as international cricket returned to Darwin after 17 years.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/meet-harry-gill-the-fan-who-took-a-stunning-one-handed-catch-while-holding-two-vodka-cans-in-the-other/articleshow/123231496.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/meet-harry-gill-the-fan-who-took-a-stunning-one-handed-catch-while-holding-two-vodka-cans-in-the-other/articleshow/123231496.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 13:09:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45986" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123231669,imgsize-45986.cms"/></item><item><title>'Situation grim': SC directs Delhi govt, MCD to start picking up stray dogs</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court addressed dog bite incidents in Delhi. A helpline will be set up within a week for reporting dog bites.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/situation-grim-sc-directs-delhi-govt-mcd-to-start-picking-up-stray-dogs-create-helpline/articleshow/123230518.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/situation-grim-sc-directs-delhi-govt-mcd-to-start-picking-up-stray-dogs-create-helpline/articleshow/123230518.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:42:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="67104" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123230518,imgsize-67104.cms"/></item><item><title>‘If these words reach you ...’: Al Jazeera reporter’s ‘final message’ before being killed</title><description><![CDATA[Al Jazeera correspondent Anas al-Sharif was killed in an Israeli airstrike in Gaza, along with four other journalists. Student arrivals may drop nearly 70%, disrupting academic plans and US university revenues. Delays stem from stricter screening, suspended interviews, and regulatory changes, pushing many to consider alternative study destinations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/study-abroad/f-1-visa-chaos-why-indian-student-approvals-are-plummeting-and-thousands-are-in-limbo-weeks-before-us-fall-semester/articleshow/123228481.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/study-abroad/f-1-visa-chaos-why-indian-student-approvals-are-plummeting-and-thousands-are-in-limbo-weeks-before-us-fall-semester/articleshow/123228481.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 11:29:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>APEKSHA TANWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3545322" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123229644,imgsize-3545322.cms"/></item><item><title>Mahomes gets family, brother Jackson’s support after preseason benching</title><description><![CDATA[Patrick Mahomes, despite limited playtime in the preseason game against the Cardinals, demonstrated his readiness and leadership. Coach Reid praised Mahomes' leadership, emphasizing his importance to the team's Super Bowl aspirations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/patrick-mahomes-backed-by-brother-jackson-and-family-after-being-benched-by-coach-andy-reid-in-preseason/articleshow/123220293.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/patrick-mahomes-backed-by-brother-jackson-and-family-after-being-benched-by-coach-andy-reid-in-preseason/articleshow/123220293.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 22:21:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="505863" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123220303,imgsize-505863.cms"/></item><item><title>Along Ladakh border, China to construct Xinjiang-Tibet rail line</title><description><![CDATA[China has officially launched the Xinjiang Tibet Railway Co. Ltd., initiating work on the strategic railway line near India's Ladakh border. Meanwhile, Trump is still considering imposing tariffs on China over its Russian oil purchases, with the decision complicated by broader aspects of the U.S.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/rapid-service-trump-presses-china-to-increase-soybean-imports-to-ease-deficit-tariff-deadline-expiry-looms/articleshow/123227515.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/rapid-service-trump-presses-china-to-increase-soybean-imports-to-ease-deficit-tariff-deadline-expiry-looms/articleshow/123227515.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 09:28:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="173134" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123227621,imgsize-173134.cms"/></item><item><title>Gunmen storm Syria hospital: Medic assaulted, shot at point-blank by armed men</title><description><![CDATA[A disturbing video from Sweida, Syria, shows armed men, allegedly Syrian military and security personnel, fatally shooting a medical worker at a hospital. The incident occurred during clashes between Druze militias, tribal groups, and government forces. Syrian authorities have launched an investigation to identify the perpetrators, vowing to bring them to justice regardless of affiliation, while activists claim the attackers were government forces.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/gunmen-storm-syria-hospital-medic-assaulted-shot-at-point-blank-by-armed-men-video-shows-cold-blooded-execution/articleshow/123227267.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/gunmen-storm-syria-hospital-medic-assaulted-shot-at-point-blank-by-armed-men-video-shows-cold-blooded-execution/articleshow/123227267.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 09:14:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="636205" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123227466,imgsize-636205.cms"/></item><item><title>Giant planet found orbiting tiny star ‘should not exist’, astronomers say</title><description><![CDATA[Astronomers have spotted a giant planet, TOI-6894b, orbiting a tiny red dwarf star, challenging existing planet formation theories. This gas giant, larger than Saturn but less massive, orbits a star only one-fifth the Sun's mass. The discovery suggests that large planets might be more common around small stars than previously believed.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/giant-planet-found-orbiting-tiny-star-should-not-exist-astronomers-say/articleshow/123220666.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/giant-planet-found-orbiting-tiny-star-should-not-exist-astronomers-say/articleshow/123220666.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 07:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19982" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123220720,imgsize-19982.cms"/></item><item><title>Fans call out Kourtney Kardashian over son’s safety on boat</title><description><![CDATA[Kourtney Kardashian Barker faced online criticism after posting boat photos where her son, Rocky Thirteen, wasn't wearing a life jacket. Followers raised safety concerns, prompting Kourtney to purchase a life vest and acknowledge the oversight. This incident highlights a common issue: parents sometimes skip life jackets for reasons like short trips or discomfort. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/parenting/moments/fans-call-out-kourtney-kardashian-over-sons-safety-on-boat-why-parents-still-skip-safety-gear-and-the-risks-theyre-taking/articleshow/123227090.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/parenting/moments/fans-call-out-kourtney-kardashian-over-sons-safety-on-boat-why-parents-still-skip-safety-gear-and-the-risks-theyre-taking/articleshow/123227090.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 08:48:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="771316" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123227104,imgsize-771316.cms"/></item></channel></rss>
